main.*:
'''Dr Craig Wesley''' is a fictional character from ''[[Days of our Lives]]'' and was portrayed by Kevin Spirtas from 1997 - 2009.  Dr Wesley also appears in the Friends version of Days of Our Lives in ''[[The One That Could Have Been, Part 1]]. ''
